nodes.name: unlockTokens

lockToken(address,uint256,address).details: lock tokens to be minted on harmony chain

params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.recipient: recipient address on the harmony chain
params.tokenId: tokenId of the token to lock

lockTokenFor(address,address,uint256,add.details: lock tokens for a user address to be minted on harmony chain

params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.recipient: recipient address on the harmony chain
params.tokenId: tokenId of the token to lock

lockTokens(address,uint256[],address).details: lock tokens to be minted on harmony chain

params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.recipient: recipient address on the harmony chain
params.tokenIds: tokenIds of the token to lock

unlockToken(address,uint256,address,byte.details: unlock tokens after burning them on harmony chain

params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.receiptId: transaction hash of the burn event on harmony chain
params.tokenId: tokenId of the token to unlock

unlockTokens(address,uint256[],address,b.details: unlock tokens after burning them on harmony chain

params.ethTokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
params.receiptId: transaction hash of the burn event on harmony chain
params.tokenIds: tokenIds of the token to unlock
